article_text:
This Is So Hilarious

April 5th, 2014 by Zachary Shahan



This US healthcare clip from the Daily Show is so absolutely hilarious. A must watch! Check, laugh so hard, then share:

Thanks to Jim Seko, who posted a link to this on a quick Planetsave article reposted over on CleanTechnica.

Of course, the comedy was amazing. But the genuine absurdity and poor quality of US healthcare before Obamacare is rather sad. So, aside from the excellent humor, I think this deserves a share for more serious reasons. Click the buttons!

Keep up to date with all the most interesting green news on the planet by subscribing to our (free) Planetsave newsletter.
